channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: Rishi Sunak may have lost his $177,000 Prime Minister gig, but a multimillion-dollar corporate payday awaits the man richer than King Charles
item.description: Book deals, speaking engagements, and a return to finance will add to Sunak’s massive net worth.

item.title: Are Your Data Governance and Management Practices Keeping Pace with the AI Boom?
item.description: No matter how sophisticated and expensive a firm's AI tools are, it should not forget that the principle “garbage in, garbage out” (GIGO) applies to the entire investment management process.

item.title: Civics is becoming a 21st-century business skill
item.description: The very skills that formed the great experiment of democracy are the same skills that lead to breakthrough ideas and continued economic growth.

item.title: Book Review: Default
item.description: Argentina’s debt restructuring tests the theoretical limits of chaos theory. Gregory Makoff's feat is to build his narrative as a thriller without losing the detailed facts valued by specialists.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Tesla recoups all its year-to-date losses after adding a staggering $150bn in market cap in just 3 days: ‘Worst is in the rear view mirror’
item.description: Investor faith in Tesla's once busted-growth story appears to have returned after a dire first-half that saw it become the butt of jokes.

item.title: Conundrum Cubed: Scope 3 for Financials
item.description: Proxy data and estimates are likely to play an important role in plugging disclosure gaps in financial institutions' Scope 3 emissions.

item.title: China’s BYD expands its reach into Southeast Asia as it inaugurates first EV plant in Thailand
item.description: The new factory in Rayong, south of Bangkok, was built in just 16 months and has an annual production capacity of 150,000 vehicles.

item.title: Hedge Funds: A Poor Choice for Most Long-Term Investors?
item.description: By allocating to a diversified pool of hedge funds, many institutional investors are unwittingly reducing their equity holdings.

item.title: Elon Musk ghosts India on new Tesla factory investment
item.description: Musk’s team hasn’t made any further inquiries with officials in New Delhi after the billionaire postponed a visit to India in late April, sources said.
